rows.label: qev051002_MSG0001
rows.name: Eep! No! P-please let me go![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0002
rows.name:
W-wait a moment... Oh!
You're not that terrifying Wrothian, are you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0003
rows.name:
Did you need something? I'm always happy to help
non-terrifying people. Er, usually?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_JNK0010
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev051002_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask what De Zing did to scare Neraph so badly.

rows.label: qev051002_JNK0020
rows.name: Inform

rows.label: qev051002_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Neraph that De Zing sent you.

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0004
rows.name:
You are concerned on my behalf? Ah, I see.
Very very kind of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0005
rows.name: That Wrothian has been sort of...stalking me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0006
rows.name:
At work... At home... The man is relentless, isn't he?
It's like he lives just to drag the secret to refining my
patented hypersteel out of me, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0007
rows.name:
When I informed him that information was proprietary,
he began roaring about dreams and unbreakable
somethings while violating my my my personal space...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0008
rows.name: ...Muh? He sent you here to ask in his stead?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0009
rows.name:
Shameless! I mean, what kind of stalker hires someone
to stalk for them? That's shameless, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0010
rows.name:
Though I guess you seem to have SOME common
sense and basic social graces, don't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0011
rows.name:
Oh, what does it matter? I'm very very tired of
running from him, so I guess it's time to give up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0012
rows.name:
Bring me the puge self-destruct mechanism I require for
my upcoming experiments, and I'll teach you how to
make hypersteel. That's fair, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0013
rows.name:
Just hurry, okay? I need to finally be be be free from
this personal Wrothian nightmare.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0014
rows.name:
*sigh* I'll divulge the fruits of long years of research.
I just ask that you bring me the self-destruct mechanism
from a puge, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0015
rows.name:
Honestly, you'll be doing me a favor by freeing me
from that that Wrothian maniac. I think he wants to
kill me or eat me or...something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0016
rows.name: AAACK![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0017
rows.name:
Oh, whew! It's just you. So so sorry about that...
I guess maybe the trauma that Wrothian inflicted runs
a bit deeper than I'd thought?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0018
rows.name:
A while back, he came after me waving a sword
around. Did I tell you that? Because he did.
I was sure he was about to to murder me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_JNK0030
rows.name: Sympathize

rows.label: qev051002_SEL0031
rows.name: Comfort the traumatized Neraph.

rows.label: qev051002_JNK0040
rows.name: Defend

rows.label: qev051002_SEL0041
rows.name:
Say that De Zing just wanted to show Neraph
his sword.

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0019
rows.name: *sniff* Your kindness warms me, you know that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0020
rows.name:
Er, so, did you acquire that puge self-destruct
mechanism?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0021
rows.name:
You are clearly a kind and reasonable person, aren't
you? Why you're running errands for that psychopath
is beyond me. ...Er, but that's not my business, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0022
rows.name:
Anyway, setting that issue aside, did you bring the
puge self-destruct mechanism?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0023
rows.name:
Yes, this will do. ...Wait, will it? ...No, yes. It's fine.
Anyway, here is the recipe for hypersteel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0024
rows.name:
Combine Cimmerian cinnabar with zagyrin cragstone
according to the instructions in that data file, okay?
Pretty simple, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0025
rows.name:
Oh, and this is brand-new tech even among us
Ma-non, so so I would appreciate if you...kept
it to yourself?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0026
rows.name:
So, er, what is this special sword that Wrothian is
trying to make, anyway? Is it really so powerful?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_JNK0050
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev051002_SEL0051
rows.name: Say it will cut through anything without breaking.

rows.label: qev051002_JNK0060
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev051002_SEL0061
rows.name: Say that it's an impractical and antiquated weapon.

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0027
rows.name:
Wow, really? I didn't realize it was so impressive.
As a technologist, I'm very very interested.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0028
rows.name:
Maybe I'll have the chance to test that sword against
the armor I make some day?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0029
rows.name:
Hmm... The Wrothians are a fascinating people.
They use these primitive tools, yet wield such power
in combat, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0030
rows.name:
Er, but don't get me wrongâ€”I still have no desire to
deal with that man ever ever again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0031
rows.name: So please tell him to just...forget all about me, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0032
rows.name: Ahh... Peace at long long last. Many thanks![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051002_MSG0033
rows.name:
I can finally focus on my research again. Which means
it's time to start discovering an even MORE amazing
new alloy, right?![ST:wait ]
